name: Waste Ninja
description:
#Jam4aCause is hosted by Gamers Outreach (GO) and they will be supporting the Upstate Golisano Children's Hospital by fundraising for a GO Kart. It's an awesome project, please consider supporting them. The fundraising link for GO can be found here.

Story:

Irresponsible people keep littering the public forest! Get ready to clean the public forest from waste. Also, I don't know where it's come from but watch out for explosive waste.

Controls:

You know how it works, don't you? <HOLD LEFT> mouse button then aim to a waste to slash and crash it!

Credits:

  • Sound effects generated using Bfxr.
  • The forest background is from Kenney.
  • Background music created using SunVox.

Project available to download for free!

Check below.
